notesStmt.note: Usage stains. Slight worming. Bound together with Or 3659.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Pilpul ῾al zeman zemanim zemanehem פלפול על זמן זמנים זמניהם
Shirim be-ginuto shel Yeshu שירים בגנותו של ישו

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian cursive scripts of the 18th to 19th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Em Ham-Melekh, Etc. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental Mss. 3659. 3660.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Jos[eph] Schlesinger: purchased by the British Museum from him on 02 March 1889: inscribed, folio [44v] (fse002v).
